strings.Value: "When I hear thunder in the middle of the fight, I always look around. And each time I see your smiling face, lit by the lightning. And in your eyes — blood, steel and claws. Battle brings you true pleasure..."

"Ha, that's true. I do like slinging lightning! And I like danger. Devil knows why... Sometimes I feel I belong there — in the thick of a battle, among the animals and beasts... Ha, ha, hmm. So, what's for dinner?"
